subject: Application for Software Developer / Mobile App Developer Position
message:
Dear Hiring Manager,

I hope this message finds you well.

My name is Mohamed Rifayath A, and I am writing to express my interest in any suitable job opportunities in your organization related to Software Development, Mobile Application Development, or Full Stack Development.

I have hands-on experience in Android, React Native, Flutter, Firebase, and web technologies, and I am passionate about building real-world applications with clean, scalable code. I have worked on multiple projects and internship assignments, and I am always eager to learn new technologies and contribute meaningfully to a team.

I would be grateful for the opportunity to be considered for any current or upcoming openings that match my profile. Please find my resume attached for your reference.

Thank you for your time and consideration. I look forward to the possibility of discussing how I can contribute to your organization.

Warm regards,
Mohamed Rifayath A
